name: Team Nimble Wildcats: Spook House
description:
Spook House is a horror platformer set in 1990's. In the game the player controls a character that has arrived  to a mansion to collect an important artefact.

Attributions:

- Font m6x11 by Daniiel Linssen :  https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

- Music by Kevin Macleod :  https://incompetech.com/

-Sound effects from : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIhVUKuO0-Q & https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myWiV_HMXtc

- Background Music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HbVYuPogyP0
